title: Carbondale police investigating fatal shooting
content:
They also did not identify the second victim, who they said was taken to Carbondale Memorial Hospital for a non-life threatening gunshot wound.
Police said they responded to the 400 block of West Walnut Street in reference to shots fired about 2 a.m. Sunday.
Officers found a party taking place and one individual who had been shot. While continuing the investigation, a second gunshot victim was found in an area adjacent to the premises who had suffered a fatal wound, police said.
Police said they are attempting to locate two African American male suspects who were at the party. Anyone with information is asked to call Carbondale police at 618-457-3200 or Crime Stoppers at 618-549-COPS (2677).
